functions.name: network_http_internet_access_restricted
functions.description: Restrict HTTP internet access in network rules.
functions.notes: Block HTTP traffic from untrusted sources.

functions.name: network_internet_access_restriction
functions.description: Restrict general internet access in network rules.
functions.notes: Apply rules to limit outbound/inbound internet traffic.

functions.name: network_services_internet_access_restriction
functions.description: Restrict internet access for network services.
functions.notes: Configure service-specific rules for internet access.

functions.name: network_traffic_monitor_unusual_activities
functions.description: Monitor network traffic for unusual activities.
functions.notes: Set up alerts and monitoring for suspicious traffic.
